content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
The government tore down my house without paying me any refund.
It seems like you' re in a very tough situation with the government shutdown and not paying a full refund? Can you talk a bit more about why?
I want to be the president so that I can take revenge of the local government.
It sounds like you have a lot of desire for the presidency but are hesitant to take it personally as it is hard to do when you feel like the government has taken control of your life.
